div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Vol. XVI, No. July 6, 1905CONFIRMATION AT ST. ADALBERT

body.p: Yesterday, at St. Adalbert, children were confirmed at 4 o'clock in the afternoon. There were even people , which a good number, the bad weather we had. At clock, the precession start from the rectory to the church. First paraded the little boys dressed in white, followed by little girls in colored dresses; following the little girls came the priests of this parish and priests representing other parishes with the Rev. Father Symon at the end. The procession marched down the center aisle up to the altar, where Symon, dressed in his confirmation .
During the confirmation Archbishop Syman was Rev. Fathers Robakowski and Bobkiewicz. The was displayed by Archbishop Symon.
During the confirmation the church choir song beautiful hymns and Miss Anna Muchowska, member of the choir, several .

It is important at this time to say that Archbishop Symens did not either before or after the confirmation ceremony, speak the gospel, or the words of confirmation to the congregation because he was suffering with pains due to bad teeth.
